title: Eagle Hall Branch
description: Located in the lively suburbs of Eagle Hall, this branch Library has been meeting the educational and recreational needs of the communities of Eagle Hall, Bank Hall, Bush Hall and surrounding districts since October 20th, 1969. Library services include access to EBSCO online database which contains e-books journals, newspapers and magazines, lending and reference services for adults and children, reading assistance, free computer and Internet access, and photocopying. Our regular hours are Monday to Friday 10:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. and 2:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m., and Saturday 9 a.m. to 1:00 p.m.
